item.title: Teach Better or Show Smarter? On Instructions and Exemplars in Automatic Prompt Optimization
item.description: Smart prompt engineering is key to unlocking LLMs’ full potential. This paper reveals that cleverly selecting examples (exemplar optimization) can outperform optimizing instructions alone, even with S…
